title: Blazing the Trail
description: When a werewolf is killed, pyrokinetic monster-fighting agent, Cassidy Blaze is sent to navigate the paranormal underworld to find out why. While tracking down the mystery, she encounters an adventurer who can see the future, a ghoulish mobster, a monstrous beast, a man who thrills in hunting the paranormal, and an ancient God planning to destroy the world.
author: Phil Morgan
